pluginstrument.author: Sim Innovations
pluginstrument.description:
Engine vibration data for X-Plane comes from a x737 dataref, because there is no general engine vibration dataref in X-Plane. So in X-Plane this will only work with the x737.
Start valve open is still to be done, as for the oil filter bypass, but there is no data for this in X-Plane nor in FSX or P3D.
The EICAS uses, except for the engine vibration, no custom datarefs or variables.
